Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to allowing bed and breakfasts to sell cider, liquor, beer and wine
Summary: Relates to allowing bed and breakfasts to sell cider, liquor, beer and wine on the licensed premises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to allowing bed and breakfasts to sell cider, liquor, beer and wine
